p: Methods: Retrospective death analysis from 1/1/2012 to 31/12/2013 in a multidisciplinary PICU of Northern Greece. All deaths happened in pts stayed for > 4hours were recorded. Data collected: Demographics, reason for and severity score at admission, treatment characteristics, and laboratory data. Appropriateness of antibiotics was defined as pathogen susceptibility to at least one drug, given at least 24 hours before death. The mode of death was classified as death due to MODS, brain death (BD), and limitation of care (DL). P < 0.05.
